Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • projet.pictionnary.breton.model.Point

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to represent a Point of the draw.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Point

        public Point(double x,
             double y,
             int thickness,
             javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
             boolean erase,
             LinePosition linePos)
        Constructs a new Point .
        Parameters:
        x - the position on the x axis.
        y - the position on the y axis.
        thickness - the thickness of the point.
        color - the color of the point.
        erase - if the point is an erasing point or not.
        linePos - the position in the line.
